tuv.seg: There are 16 Government departments
Tá 16 Ranna Rialtais ann
Each department is headed by a minister appointed by the Taoiseach
Déanann an Taoiseach aire a cheapadh chun dul i gceannas ar gach roinn
You can get a list of Government Ministers and Ministers of State
Tá liostaí Airí agus Airí Stáit anseo
Each department has a permanent staff that remains in office regardless of changes in Government
Tá foireann oibre buan ag gach roinn a fhanann sa roinn fiú má thagann athrú ar an Rialtas atá i réim
The departments' staff are described as the civil service
Tugtar an Státseirbhís ar an bhfoireann oibre buan seo
If you have a complaint about a decision or action of a Government department or a public body and have exhausted their internal complaints process, you may contact the Ombudsman
Má tá gearán le déanamh agat faoi aon chinneadh nó aon ghníomh a dhéanann Roinn Rialtais nó aon eagraíocht phoiblí, is féidir Cosantóir an Phobail a chur ar an eolas faoi
Changes in the names and responsibilities of some departments were announced on 6 May 2016
Fógraíodh athruithe ar ainmneacha agus ar fhreagrachtaí ranna áirithe an 6 Bealtaine 2016
• Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine: This Department regulates the agriculture and food industries
• An Roinn Talmhaíochta, Iascaireachtaí agus Bia: Rialaíonn an Roinn seo tionscal an bhia agus tionscal na talmhaíochta

• Department of Arts, Heritage, Regional, Rural and Gaeltacht Affairs: This Department promotes and protects Ireland’s heritage and culture. It also advances the use of the Irish language, supports the sustainable development of the islands and develops cultural tourism

• An Roinn Ealaíon, Oidhreachta, Gnóthaí Réigiúnacha, Tuaithe agus Gaeltachta: Is iad spriocanna na Roinne seo oidhreacht agus cultúr na hÉireann a chosaint agus a chur chun cinn, úsáid na Gaeilge a chur chun cinn, tacú le forbairt inbhuanaithe na n-oileán agus turasóireacht chultúrtha a fhorbairt
• Department of Children and Youth Affairs: This Department is responsible for the development of harmonised policies and quality integrated service delivery for children and young people
• An Roinn Leanaí agus Gnóthaí Óige: Tá an Roinn seo freagrach as forbairt ar bheartais chomhchuibhithe agus ar sheachadadh seirbhíse comhtháite do leanaí agus daoine óga
It carries out specific functions in the social care field and drives coordinated actions across a range of sectors, including health, education, youth justice, sport, arts and culture

Déanann sí feidhmeanna sonracha sa réimse chúraim shóisialta agus treoraíonn sí gníomhartha comhordaithe thar raon earnálacha, lena n-áirítear sláinte, oideachas, ceartas óige, spórt, na healaíona agus an cultúr
• Department of Communications, Climate Action and Environment: This Department has responsibility for the telecommunications and broadcasting sectors
• An Roinn Cumarsáide, Gníomhaithe ar son na hAeráide agus Comhshaoil. Tá an Roinn seo freagrach as na rannóga teileachumarsáide agus craolacháin
It promotes the development of a competitive energy supply industry and is responsible for ensuring the security and reliability of energy supply
Cuireann sí tionsclaíocht iomaíoch soláthair fuinnimh chun cinn agus tá sí freagrach as sláine agus iontaofacht an tsoláthair sin
It also regulates, protects and develops the inland fisheries and natural resources of Ireland
Tá sí freagrach, freisin, as iascaigh intíre agus acmhainní nádúrtha na hÉireann a rialú, a chosaint agus a fhorbairt
The Geological Survey of Ireland is linked to this Department
Tá baint ag Suirbhéireacht Gheolaíoch na hÉireann leis an Roinn seo
• Department of Defence: This Department manages and controls the defence forces
• An Roinn Cosanta. Tá cúram ár bhfórsaí cosanta ar an Roinn seo
• Department of Education and Skills: This Department is responsible for providing public education at primary and post-primary levels
• An Roinn Oideachais agus Scileanna: Tá sé de chúram ar an Roinn seo oideachas poiblí a chur ar fáil ag leibhéal bunscoile agus iar-bhunscoile
It also manages State subsidies for universities and third-level colleges
Déanann sí, freisin, bainistiú ar íocaíochtaí stáit d'ollscoileanna agus do choláistí triú leibhéal
It also has responsibility for training and the work of the Expert Group on Future Skills Needs
Tá sé freagrach chomh maith as traenáil agus as obair an Ghrúpa Saineolaithe ar Riachtanais Scileanna sa Todhchaí
• Department of Finance: This Department is concerned with the economic and financial management of the State
• An Roinn Airgeadais: Tá cúram airgeadais agus eacnamaíochta an Stáit ar an Roinn seo
• Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade
• An Roinn Gnóthaí Eachtracha agus Trádála
This Department promotes and protects our interests abroad
Cuireann an Roinn seo ár leasa thar lear chun cinn agus déanann sí cosaint orthu
It pursues peace and reconciliation on the island of Ireland
Cothaíonn sí síochán agus athmhuintearas ar oileán na hÉireann
It is also responsible for foreign trade and development
Tá sí freagrach freisin as trádáil eachtrach agus forbairt
• Department of Health: This Department is responsible for development of health policy and the planning of health services
• An Roinn Sláinte: Tá an Roinn seo freagrach as polasaí sláinte a fhorbairt agus seirbhísí sláinte a phleanáil
Health services are provided by the Health Service Executive (HSE)
Cuireann Feidhmeannacht na Seirbhíse Sláinte (FSS) na seirbhísí sláinte ar fáil
• Department of Housing, Planning, Community and Local Government: This Department has functions relating to housing and it promotes development
• An Roinn Tithíochta, Pleanála, Pobail agus Rialtais Áitiúil. Tá cúramaí ar an Roinn maidir le tithíocht agus déanann an Roinn seo forbairt a chothú
It oversees the local authorities
Tá sí i gceannas ar údaráis áitiúla
• Department of Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation: This Department is responsible for the promotion and development of enterprise, employment, the protection of workers and the regulation of businesses

• An Roinn Post, Fiontar agus Nuálaíochta: Tá sé de chúram ar an Roinn seo forbairt a dhéanamh ar fhiontair, ar fhostaíocht agus ar thrádáil agus tá sí freagrach freisin as oibrithe a chosaint agus gnóthaí a rialú
• Department of Justice and Equality: This Department aims to protect the security of the State, to prevent and tackle crime and to protect individuals' rights and freedoms
• An Roinn Dlí agus Cirt, agus Comhionannais: Tá sé mar aidhm ag an Roinn seo an Stát a chosaint, coireanna a smachtú agus saoirse agus cearta an duine a chaomhnú
It also deals with immigration
Tá cúram inimirce agus iarratais dídine uirthi freisin
• Department of Public Expenditure and Reform: This Department advises the Government on the overall management and control of the public sector
• An Roinn Caiteachais Phoiblí agus Athchóirithe: Cuireann sí comhairle ar an Rialtas maidir le bainistiú agus smacht a bheith ar an earnáil phoiblí
• Department of Social Protection: This Department provides income and other support services
• An Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí: Soláthraíonn an Roinn seo seirbhísí tacaíochta ioncaim agus seirbhísí tacaíochta eile
It has responsibility for the provision of employment support, guidance and placement services as well as community services and the Rural Social Scheme
Tá sí freagrach as soláthar seirbhísí tacaíochta fostaíochta, treorach agus socrúcháin, chomh maith le seirbhísí pobail agus an Scéim Sóisialta Tuaithe
It is also responsible for the payment of redundancy and insolvency payments
Tá sí freagrach as íocaíochtaí iomarcaíochta agus dócmhainneachta a íoc freisin
This Department provides administrative and research support services to the Taoiseach and the Government
Tugann an Roinn seo tacaíocht riaracháin agus taighde don Taoiseach agus don Rialtas
• Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport
• An Roinn Iompair, Turasóireachta agus Spóirt
This Department is responsible for roads (other than local roads), driver testing, traffic issues, bus and rail transport, aviation policy, and road safety
Tá an Roinn seo freagrach as na bóithre (seachas bóithre áitiúla), tástáil tiomána, saincheisteanna tráchta, iompar bus agus traenach, beartas eitleoireachta, agus sábháilteacht bóithre in Éirinn
It is also responsible for the growth of sustainable tourism and it promotes sport at local, regional, and national levels
Chomh maith leis sin cuireann an Roinn spórt chun cinn ag leibhéil áitiúil, réigiúnda agus náisiúnta
